forum.content:
好天氣帶來自美國的新朋友Matthew登頂姆指山看美景，一邊爬山一邊語言交換，他說他第一次跟男生語言交換，哈哈～我們沿途聊很多，雖然有些聽不懂，但今天應該是我說最多英文的一天。明天他就要開始15天的單車環島之旅，祝一切順利！

We're on the Thumb Mountain!
Meet new friend Matthew from US for exchanging language with hiking.
He said it's the first time to exchange language with a guy, haha~
We talked many things of life, even sonetimes can't understand some sentences but today is really the day I have spoken most English in my life.
Tomorrow he'll start the bike tour around Taiwan of 15 days. Wish him luck!
forum.title: Hiking with language exchange
